SELECT ba.article_id, ba.user_id, su.nickname, ba.category_id, bc.category_name, ba.is_top, ba.article_cover, ba.article_title, ba.article_summary, ba.view_counts, ba.create_time FROM `blog_article` AS ba LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON ba.user_id = su.id LEFT JOIN blog_category AS bc ON ba.category_id = bc.category_id WHERE ba.article_check='1' AND ba.is_deleted='0' AND ba.article_visible='1'
AND bc.category_id = #{queryArticleDTO.categoryId}
AND ba.article_id in ( SELECT ba2.article_id FROM blog_article AS ba2 LEFT JOIN blog_article_tag AS bat ON ba2.article_id = bat.article_id WHERE bat.tag_id = #{queryArticleDTO.tagId} )
ORDER BY is_top DESC, ba.create_time DESC

SELECT ba.article_id, ba.user_id, su.nickname, ba.category_id, bc.category_name, ba.is_top, ba.article_cover, ba.article_title, ba.article_summary, ba.view_counts, ba.create_time FROM `blog_article` AS ba LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON ba.user_id = su.id LEFT JOIN blog_category AS bc ON ba.category_id = bc.category_id WHERE ba.article_check='1' AND ba.is_deleted='0' AND (ba.user_id=#{loginUserId} OR ba.article_visible='1')
AND bc.category_id = #{queryArticleDTO.categoryId}
AND ba.article_id in ( SELECT ba2.article_id FROM blog_article AS ba2 LEFT JOIN blog_article_tag AS bat ON ba2.article_id = bat.article_id WHERE bat.tag_id = #{queryArticleDTO.tagId} )
ORDER BY is_top DESC, ba.create_time DESC

SELECT ba.article_id, ba.user_id, su.nickname, bc.category_id, bc.category_name, ba.is_top, ba.article_cover, ba.article_title, ba.article_summary, ba.article_content, ba.article_visible, ba.view_counts, ba.comment_allowed, ba.article_check, ba.create_time, ba.update_time FROM `blog_article` AS ba LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON ba.user_id = su.id LEFT JOIN blog_category AS bc ON ba.category_id = bc.category_id WHERE ba.article_check='1' AND ba.is_deleted='0' AND ba.article_id = #{articleId};

SELECT ba.article_id, su.nickname, bc.category_name, ba.is_top, ba.article_cover, ba.article_title, ba.article_visible, ba.view_counts, ba.comment_allowed, ba.article_check, ba.create_time FROM `blog_article` AS ba LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON ba.user_id = su.id LEFT JOIN blog_category AS bc ON ba.category_id = bc.category_id WHERE ba.is_deleted='0'
AND bc.category_name like concat('%',#{queryArticleDTO.categoryName},'%')
AND ba.article_check = #{queryArticleDTO.articleCheck}
ORDER BY is_top DESC

SELECT ba.article_id, ba.user_id, ba.category_id, ba.is_top, ba.article_cover, ba.article_title, ba.article_summary, ba.article_content, ba.article_visible, ba.comment_allowed, ba.article_check FROM `blog_article` AS ba WHERE ba.article_id = #{articleId}

SELECT ba.article_id, su.nickname, ba.article_cover, ba.article_title, ba.view_counts, ba.create_time FROM `blog_article` AS ba LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON ba.user_id = su.id WHERE ba.article_check='1' AND ba.is_deleted='0' ORDER BY ba.view_counts DESC LIMIT #{pageNum}, #{pageSize}

SELECT ba.article_id, ba.article_title, ba.article_visible, ba.create_time FROM `blog_article` AS ba WHERE ba.article_check='1' AND ba.is_deleted='0'
AND (ba.user_id=#{loginUserId} OR ba.article_visible='1')
AND ba.article_visible='1'
ORDER BY ba.create_time DESC
